        Description copied from class: Object3D
        Renders the object
        Overrides:
        render in class Object3D
        Parameters:
        camera - The camera
        vpMatrix - Matrix4 The view-projection matrix
        projMatrix - Matrix4 The projection matrix
        vMatrix - Matrix4 The view matrix
        parentMatrix - Matrix4 This object's parent matrix
        pickerInfo - The current color picker info. This is only used when an object is touched.
